name: SECLabs
tag_list: app-builder, free-mobile-apps, app-creator, app-maker, make-apps, build-apps, create-apps, app-generator, app-templates, app-themes, app-hosting, mobile-site-creator, jquery-mobile-widgets, iphone-app-builder, android-app-builder, html5-app-builder
overview:
Build Mobile Sites and Apps in real-time.

Our User Interface is really simple, fast and effective. We get in touch with each and every user who signs up and they all give is the same feedback - its easy to build and they can see their output immediately. Additionally, we offer different templates that our users can pick and choose from. Some of the features we offer for free to users to add to their App includes Forms, Video, Audio, RSS, News & lot more.

Each app comes with free 9 point validation, QR codes and integrated hosting.

Finally, we also offer Android native app convert option that the user can use to generate APK files which they can deploy to Google Play Store. For new users we offer help to get their apps to the Google Play Store if they have difficulty.

iPhone and iPad versions are coming soon.
